intro.what_is_recrowd_descr:
Recrowd is a <bold>real estate crowdfunding platform</bold> that allows you to invest your savings in an alternative way, even if you don't have large capital.

Through <bold>lending crowdfunding< /bold> and by using an easy to understand and highly profitable asset such as real estate, you will have the opportunity to access short, medium and long-term opportunities, with an excellent return.
intro.how_recrowd_works_descr:
Recrowd is a <bold>real estate crowdfunding platform</bold> that allows you to invest your savings in an alternative way, even if you don't have large capital.

Through <bold>lending crowdfunding< /bold> and by using an easy-to-understand and highly profitable asset such as real estate, you will have the opportunity to access short, medium and long-term opportunities, with an excellent return.
